Question: Geotab, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Geotab, Inc.

Geotab Connect 2024

- Premier event focused on connected vehicles, data intelligence, AI, and sustainability
- Sessions featuring expert panels, customer success stories, and deep dives into data intelligence, AI, and sustainability
- New immersive Event Center with IOX Games showcasing sensors and video integration
- Geotab Installer Challenge, Connected Claims "Bumper Cars," Sustainability Alliance lounge, "Ride & Drive," and Hackathon for innovation
- Unlocks data from over 4 million connected vehicles and 75 billion data points daily
- Provides insights for informed decision making, productivity improvement, fleet optimization, fuel consumption, driver safety, sustainability outcomes, and compliance requirements

For more information on Geotab Connect 2024, visit: https://www.geotab.com/connect/.
Summary_cn:
Geotab，Inc.

Geotab Connect 2024

- 着重于连接车辆、数据智能、人工智能和可持续性的首要活动
- 演示会议涵盖专家小组、客户成功案例和深入探讨数据智能、人工智能和可持续性的内容
- 新的沉浸式活动中心，展示传感器和视频整合的IOX游戏
- Geotab安装挑战、连接事故索赔的“保险杠碰碰车”、可持续性联盟休息室、“骑行和试驾”以及创新马拉松
- 解锁来自超过400万连接车辆和每日750亿数据点的数据
- 提供决策支持、提高生产力、优化车队、节约燃料、驾驶员安全、可持续性和符合要求的见解

有关更多关于Geotab Connect 2024的信息，请访问：https://www.geotab.com/connect/.
